creator: pTech
descriptionHtml:
This one volume commentary on the entire Bible from John MacArthur offers understandable resources designed to convey the Bible's overarching message with historical and theological clarity.
Pastor and teacher John MacArthur covers the complete Bible . Every passage of the Old and New Testaments are explained phrase by phrase.

The main features of this application are:
- Highlight verses with different colors.
- Easy chapter and verse navigation.
- Bible bases on New International Version.
- Bold, italic and underline the selected text.
- Easily switch dark and light theme.
- Font size slider with different font family options.
- Copy selected text for sharing.
- Landscape and portrait mode.
- Great looking user interface.

Download this application and share it with your friends.
descriptionShort: Complete Commentary of the Bible by John MacArthur in one volume offline.
